channel.title: Server Access
channel.description: I have created a server and used http://www.dyndns.com/ as my DNS update client. Ok I have portforwared my router, modem, and put the exception in my firewall and it says my port is open on online checks etc and I can connect to it, but my friend can't on his laptop. Is this a problem on his end or mine?

item.title: Server Access
item.dc:creator: @dogzound5 dogzound5@gmail.com
